title: The Living reef
creator_credit: Ken J. Widdowson and Film Victoria
brief_description: The longest and largest reef in the world lies off the North-East Coast of Australia. The Great Barrier Reef extends from New Guinea to central Queensland.
description: The longest and largest reef in the world lies off the North-East Coast of Australia. The Great Barrier Reef extends from New Guinea to central Queensland.
